entity.name: disease
entity.query: select disease_id as id, 'disease' as type, disease_id, disease_term, disease_alts, disease_classes, human_curated, mouse_curated, mgi_predicted, impc_predicted, mgi_predicted_in_locus, impc_predicted_in_locus from disease_summary;

entity.name: disease_gene
entity.query: select concat(disease_id, '_', mgi_gene_id) as id, 'disease_association' as type, disease_id, mgi_gene_symbol, disease_term, disease_alts, human_curated, mouse_curated from disease_gene_summary;

entity.name: gene
entity.query: select mgi_gene_id as id, 'gene' as type, mgi_gene_id, mgi_gene_symbol, human_gene_symbol, hgnc_id, human_curated, mouse_curated, mgi_predicted, impc_predicted, mgi_predicted_in_locus, impc_predicted_in_locus, mgi_mouse, impc_mouse, impc_pheno from gene_summary;

entity.name: disease_model
entity.query: select concat(disease_id, '_', mouse_model_id) as id, 'disease_mouse_model' as type, disease_id, mgi_gene_id, mgi_gene_symbol, mouse_model_id, source from disease_mouse_genotype_associations;
